description.raw:
This sets the correct dtype for the raw output arrays of static outputs.

This should fix the following crashes when using StaticOutputs with NI Cards:

    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "test_analogin_samplerate.py", line 70, in <module>
      File "E:\labscript_suite\labscript\labscript.py", line 2132, in stop
        generate_code()
      File "E:\labscript_suite\labscript\labscript.py", line 2034, in generate_code
        device.generate_code(hdf5_file)
      File "E:\labscript_suite\labscript_devices\PulseBlaster_No_DDS.py", line 72, in generate_code
        PseudoclockDevice.generate_code(self, hdf5_file)
      File "E:\labscript_suite\labscript\labscript.py", line 948, in generate_code
        Device.generate_code(self, hdf5_file)
      File "E:\labscript_suite\labscript\labscript.py", line 428, in generate_code
        device.generate_code(hdf5_file)
      File "E:\labscript_suite\labscript\labscript.py", line 832, in generate_code
        Device.generate_code(self, hdf5_file)
      File "E:\labscript_suite\labscript\labscript.py", line 428, in generate_code
        device.generate_code(hdf5_file)
      File "E:\labscript_suite\labscript\labscript.py", line 428, in generate_code
        device.generate_code(hdf5_file)
      File "E:\labscript_suite\labscript_devices\NI_DAQmx.py", line 202, in generate_code
        digital_out_table = self.convert_bools_to_bytes(digitals.values())
      File "E:\labscript_suite\labscript_devices\NIBoard.py", line 75, in convert_bools_to_bytes
        bits = bitfield(outputarray,dtype=self.dtype_DO)
      File "E:\labscript_suite\labscript\labscript.py", line 109, in bitfield
        y |= arrays[i]<<i
    TypeError: ufunc 'bitwise_or' output (typecode 'i') could not be coerced to provided output parameter (typecode 'B') according to the casting rule ''same_kind''
    Compilation aborted.

title: Bugfix for StaticOutputs
